keyPolicies.policyDescription: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly. Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year. Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors.
Protect education spending from cradle to college. Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school children.

mentions.candidate: I would like to join Ashuk Ahmed's Lib Dems

issues.economy: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain
issues.education: Protect education spending from cradle to college
issues.health: Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year

contactInformation.address: Printed by Prontaprint Europa, Chauhaus, 70 Upper Chase, Chelmsford CM2 0BN, Published and Promoted by Prinston on behalf of Ashuk Ahmed (Liberal Democrat), both at 56 Ridgeway Road, Luton LU3 3LJ
